name: Flying Aces (itch)
description: Woosh. You throw your paper airplane into the sky and watch as it soars gracefully toward a flagpole in the distance. Oh no! A gust of wind blows your paper airplane to the ground. You pick it up and decide to try again. You throw your plane and watch as this time, it reaches the flagpole. The crowd goes wild and the judge’s score goes up. The next course is now open. You pick up your paper airplane and continue to the next challenge.
